basicInfo.name: Lucy
basicInfo.flavor: Lucy achieved mastery over spiritual powers as she comforted many lost souls. People address her as the Exotic Spiritualist because of her rare skill.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack plus 60% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Physical Attack Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Attack Reduction to 11%.

Skill 1.name: Mystic Dance
Skill 1.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 100% of the caster's Defense.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes 120% of Defense.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Back Row Allies (Magic)
 - Adds Effect: Skill Cooldown Reduction of 15s.

Skill 2.name: Dancer's Prayer
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Can be used only if the ally has a removable buff.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Defense Boost to 22%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Effect: Debuff Removal count becomes 3.

Passive.name: Spirit Dancer
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Poison Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Poison Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Heals HP equal to 92% of the caster's Defense upon activating a skill 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 92% of Defense upon activating a skill 1 time(s).

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

basicInfo.name: Lucy
basicInfo.flavor: Lucy comforts the lost and cursed souls with her beautiful dancing and soothing rituals.

Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Magic Attack plus 55% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Physical Attack Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 55% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 95% of the caster's Defense.

Skill 2.name: Dancer's Prayer

All Allies
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Can be used only if the ally has a removable buff.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s).
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 13%.

Passive.name: Spirit Dancer
Passive.desc:
All Allies

 - Grants Poison Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

basicInfo.name: Lucy
basicInfo.flavor: Lucy's lively character is highlighted by her talent for dancing. She also has spiritual abilities and knows how to invoke the gods.

Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Magic Attack plus 50% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Physical Attack Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Magic Attack.

All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 85% of the caster's Defense.

 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 11%.

All Allies
